snippet.title: Awakening: The Dreamless Castle
snippet.description:
Awakening: The Dreamless Castle for PC: http://www.bigfishgames.com/download-games/7382/awakening-the-dreamless-castle/index.html

Awakening: The Dreamless Castle for Mac: http://www.bigfishgames.com/download-games/7691/mac/awakening-the-dreamless-castle/index.html

After Awakening in a mysterious castle its up to you to collect clues and valuable items needed to solve perplexing puzzles and escape! Listen to your fairy friend as she guides you towards the exit. Play fun minigames and solve clever locks to make it to the next room in the castle. Use your Hidden Object skills to search for the next hint and discover a young Princess destiny in Awakening: The Dreamless Castle.

  * Gorgeous graphics
  * Escape the castle!
  * Check out our complete game walkthrough at http://www.bigfishgames.com/blog/awakening-the-dreamless-castle-walkthrough/
  * Get the Strategy Guide at http://www.bigfishgames.com/download-games/7373/awakening-the-dreamless-castle-strategy-guide/index.html
